name: KA-MIL 1
description:
Kinesthetic Artificially-Mutated Intelligent Lifeform 1
(A Wave-Survival Third Person Shooter)

KA-MIL 1 is the result of the first iteration of an UnEthical series of experiments designed to produce a lifeform that will be the leading militaristic force for the expansion of humankind across the cosmos.

All Inmates that undergo the accelerated gene-mutation experiments will be compensated for their contribution to the evolution of humankind.*

* Any non-human mutations will void the warranty conditions.

Controls:
WASD + mouse for walking/aiming/shooting; 

Hold left shift to run

Jam Info:

All Inverse Kinematics, models, code, etc.  were made by the team during HUJAM, in a 72 hour period. Assets used are listed below.

2 arenas and 4 creatures that did not make it to the finish line.

Assets used (All of them by Unity Technologies):

  • Cinemachine (Third person camera setup)
  • Animation Rigging (Inverse Kinematics editor tool)
  • Standart Assets Characters (Leg animations for the player)
  • UI Samples (Game Start menu)
  • Unity Particle Pack (Weapon/Bullet particle effect)
